title: Closing a support facility
context: ยง412:3-508 Closing a support facility. A Hawaii financial institution shall provide notice to the commissioner of its closure of a support facility within thirty days of the closing. The notice shall contain the location of the support facility closed and the date of closing. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1; am L 2006, c 228, ยง23]
